title: Those special High Noon Jhin lines...Heh.
body:
Not even sure if these are legit, but, but...*snicker*...those Django Unchained and Clint Eastwood references, among some others, are so, so good. And the Teemo one is just gold.

For those who haven't seen these yet (or heard them, I haven't, now I might sign on the PBE just to hear them), here's three of my favorites:

Upon killing an enemy Teemo with Curtain Call as High Noon Jhin
_"I like the way you die, boy."_

Upon killing an enemy Noxian with Curtain Call as High Noon Jhin
_"Kill Noxians and get paid for it? What's not to like?"_

Upon killing an enemy Yasuo with Curtain Call as High Noon Jhin
_"It's fun to kill a man. To take all that he had, and could ever have."_

http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Jhin/Quotes

replies.body:
Glad you like them! This was one of our first efforts to record some custom VO for the launch skin, because we can do it at the same time as the base recording. It's quite tricky because it happens so far ahead of development that we're not sure what will be useful when it comes time to implement them. For this one we were fairly conservative and just used them for finishing off a few choice champions - a small bonus on the skin but hopefully one that will surprise a few players >:D

Next launch skin I work on I'm going to push for a bit more, but it really relies on us deciding on a theme well ahead of time.

Doesn't Jinx have a custom line in her mafia skin or am I crazy?

Please note: I am probably crazy.

She has a few walking and attacking ones.

"Scream along if you know the words!"
"I've got a recital, and everyone's invited!"
"Who wants a solo?"
"What's in my violin case? Violence."

Also when casting ZAP!

"Drink up"
"Pop the cork!"

Ah, I've only ever heard the ZAP! ones because I don't own that skin, so I never hear the move/attack ones.

So I guess Jhin is the second time unless I am forgetting about another :P
